synopsis.text:
Period ically, powerful warlords and their followers are reborn, seeking to alter the outcome of the Sengoku era by engaging in a hidden conflict known as the Dark Civil War. Unbeknownst to the ordinary world, this battle rages in the Feudal Underworld, impacting the realm of the living.

High school student Ougi Takaya believes he's just like everyone else, until he crosses paths with Naoe Nobutsuna. Nobutsuna reveals that Takaya is the reincarnation of Uesugi Kagetora, a member of a clan dedicated to banishing malevolent spirits. With his newfound abilities, Takaya is thrust into the heart of the Dark Civil War.

Unlike his fellow reincarnated warriors, Takaya has no recollection of his past lives, making him an enigma in this age-old battle. As he grapples with his destiny, he forges a complex bond with Nobutsuna, who harbors secrets about their shared history. Together, they stand against the looming threat of the Hojo and Fuma clans, who seek to plunge the living world into chaos.

As Takaya unravels the truth about his past and confronts his destiny, he must navigate a tumultuous web of emotions, pride, and purpose in this supernatural war.
